articles.title: GenZ, millennials cheer to a Stranger Things themed New Year, brands hop on to the party
articles.description: By leveraging a staggered release strategy, Netflix achieved high social media engagement throughout late 2025, enabling brands like Swiggy Instamart to integrate immersive technology into their apps.
articles.content: However, Netflix’s strategy of splitting the fifth and final season into three drops kept social media buzzing throughout 2025. Data from influencer marketing agency Qoruz shows that around 13,000 influencers—with at least 1,000 followers on public a... [5160 chars]

articles.title: 7 Space Science And Technology Breakthroughs To Watch For In 2026
articles.description: As space scales into daily infrastructure, which moments in 2026 will still feel new -and which will quietly change everything?
articles.content: As 2026 gets underway, space feels unusually present in everyday conversation. Reusable rockets are launching with a regularity that would have seemed implausible a decade ago. Low Earth orbit (LEO) satellite constellations are now fully operational.... [20373 chars]

articles.title: In Depth: Global Copyright Fight Heats Up Over AI Content Boom
articles.description: In Depth: Global Copyright Fight Heats Up Over AI Content Boom - Film studios such as Disney, music labels and tech giants are navigating lawsuits as the technology blurs lines between innovation and infringement
articles.content: Increasingly powerful artificial intelligence (AI) models unleashed a tidal wave of digital content in 2025 — and with it, intensifying legal and regulatory disputes as creators and media companies sought to protect what they see as their most valuab... [521 chars]

articles.title: Farmington Fire Department to launch emergency vehicle alert technology
articles.description: New system implemented Thursday, according to the city
articles.content:
Drivers in the Four Corners will soon be alerted to emergency vehicles up to 30 seconds before seeing them on the highway.
Starting the new year, the Farmington Fire Department will implement HAAS Alert's Safety Cloud, which will deliver real-time di... [1385 chars]

articles.title: Net Zero backlash as campaigners warn slave labour must not be used to produce green technology
articles.description: An overwhelming majority of people (83 per cent) say the Government must ensure that all products and materials bought for net zero projects are ethically sourced.
articles.content:
Net Zero goals should be pushed back to ensure slave labour is not used in making green technology, the public has said.
With Ed Miliband poised to splurge billions of pounds on solar power, batteries and heat pumps in a scramble to meet Labour's ple... [3135 chars]

articles.title: 15 ‘Technology Business Incubators’ established in Universities across India: Dr Jitendra
articles.description: Excelsior Correspondent NEW DELHI, Jan 1: Department of Science & Technology (DST) has established 15 Inclusive “Technology Business Incubators” (i-TBI) across universities and higher educational institutions in different parts of the country, aimed at democratising innovation and entrepreneurship beyond metropolitan centres. This was disclosed here today by Union Minister of State (Independent Charge) for Science & Technology, Earth Sciences, and Minister of State in the PMO, Personnel, Public Grievances, Pensions, Atomic Energy and Space, Dr. Jitendra Singh, during a visit […]
articles.content:
Excelsior Correspondent
NEW DELHI, Jan 1: Department of Science & Technology (DST) has established 15 Inclusive “Technology Business Incubators” (i-TBI) across universities and higher educational institutions in different parts of the country, aimed ... [4013 chars]

articles.title: JU inaugurates e-Governance initiatives to enhance digital administration & services
articles.description: Excelsior Correspondent JAMMU, Jan 1: The University of Jammu today achieved a significant milestone in its digital transformation journey with the inauguration of three major e-Governance initiatives-Leave Management System, IT Service Desk Management System, and the Automated Official Email Creation System on the Jammu University domain. The initiatives were formally inaugurated by the Vice-Chancellor JU, Prof Umesh Rai, who emphasized the pivotal role of technology in ensuring efficient, transparent, and accountable governance. He lauded the Director, Centre for IT Enabled […]
articles.content:
Excelsior Correspondent
JAMMU, Jan 1: The University of Jammu today achieved a significant milestone in its digital transformation journey with the inauguration of three major e-Governance initiatives-Leave Management System, IT Service Desk Manageme... [2361 chars]

articles.title: SKUAST-K rings in 2026 with ‘achiever of the year’ awards
articles.description: Excelsior Correspondent SRINAGAR, Jan 1: Sher-e-Kashmir University of Agricultural Sciences and Technology of Kashmir held a special celebratory event to mark the start of 2026 by honouring the scientists, students and university staff whose efforts propelled the institution to its current standing as the third-best state agricultural university (SAU) in the country. Addressing a packed audience, Vice Chancellor Prof Nazir Ahmad Ganai set a high bar for the coming year. While presenting the ‘Achiever of the Year’ awards, Prof Ganai […]
